description: Positions of the flipped bits in the sequence A059459.
comments: E.g. starting from A059459[1] = 2, flip (set) bit 0, gives A059459[2] = 3 (= 2+2^0), then flip (set) bit 2, gives A059459[3] = 7 (3+2^2), then flip (clear) bit 1, gives A059459[4] = 5 (7-2^1), etc.
author: _Antti Karttunen_, Feb 03 2001
